Articles.Content: so i wanted to edit my persistent file but i noticed my saves were not in my saves folder but it still loads the saves, any help?

I assume you are using steam. In which case they are saved somewhere else. I would make a guess as to where (I think maybe somewhere in your documents folder?), but I'm not a steam user myself. So hopefully one will be along soon.

Welcome to the forums!

~Claw

If KSP's home folder (steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program) is set to read-only, Windows might redirect the save file location to somewhere else... to the best of my knowledge, it should be somewhere in the %APPDATA% directory, but I can't quite remember where...
